channel.title: I will host your server
channel.description:
Wasn't really sure what section to post this in so if this is incorrect please move it... Anyway, on with the reason of this thread. I have a VPS which isn't really being used at the moment so it's just a wasted resource, for the next month (at the very least) I can host somebody's server - but I have some requirements, don't bother contacting me if you don't agree to these or fit any of the descriptions:-
- Server must be stable, I was hosting somebody else's recently and it kept crashing (not my problem, was their shitty coding) this meant I had to put in more work than I was willing, so I just closed it down. - I want to receive any donations to the server, at least to cover costs. Then we split anything after the costs 50/50. Money goes to my paypal. - Server must be active and growing (50players online average is minimum), if you have a lot of players and your server is lagging at the moment this is your solution. - I want to be an admin (or co-owner) I'll also have decisions on who becomes a moderator, who gets banned etc, if I think your friend is abusive I'll just ban them.
Whoever takes up this offer I will also throw in a free domain (.com/.net) for you to put whatever you want on it related to the server, or I'll just set up a forum on it for you. Any questions ask away... or feel free to contact me via MSN or email @ anon.of.brother@gmail.com

item.title: I will host your server
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You may not offer services here.

Read full topic

item.title: I will host your server
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“duckroll, post:6, topic:328773”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=425165.msg3122554#msg3122554 date=1265673091]

  • I want to receive any donations to the server, at least to cover costs. Then we split anything after the costs 50/50. Money goes to my paypal.
  • Server must be active and growing (50players online average is minimum), if you have a lot of players and your server is lagging at the moment this is your solution.
  • I want to be an admin (or co-owner) I’ll also have decisions on who becomes a moderator, who gets banned etc, if I think your friend is abusive I’ll just ban them.
    [/quote]Beggars can’t be choosers. Lin’s giving you not only advice for posting within the forum, but business advice as well. You can’t demand such things and expect your customers to approve of it?

Beggars can’t be choosers.

Wah, that doesn’t even make sense. I’m not sure you understand the meaning of that idiom.

I came here offering a free service whilst expecting very little in return, please tell me what’s so outrageous about my requests.[/quote]Expecting very little? You’re basically controlling the other person’s server! You’re stealing all of the server donations and controlling the staff and who plays. Let’s not forget it can’t even be coded the way the owner wants it to be. It has to meet your expectations.

So let me elaborate on the stealing donations. You’re basically taking them to cover the costs of the VPS. If their donations could cover the cost, wouldn’t they buy their own? This is just a horrible way of stealing someone else’s server to make money.

Read full topic

item.title: I will host your server
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“duckroll, post:6, topic:328773”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=425165.msg3122554#msg3122554 date=1265673091]

  • I want to receive any donations to the server, at least to cover costs. Then we split anything after the costs 50/50. Money goes to my paypal.
  • Server must be active and growing (50players online average is minimum), if you have a lot of players and your server is lagging at the moment this is your solution.
  • I want to be an admin (or co-owner) I’ll also have decisions on who becomes a moderator, who gets banned etc, if I think your friend is abusive I’ll just ban them.
    [/quote]Beggars can’t be choosers. Lin’s giving you not only advice for posting within the forum, but business advice as well. You can’t demand such things and expect your customers to approve of it?

Beggars can’t be choosers.

Wah, that doesn’t even make sense. I’m not sure you understand the meaning of that idiom.

I came here offering a free service whilst expecting very little in return, please tell me what’s so outrageous about my requests.[/quote]You’re begging for users to use your service while choosing how they use it. I know the idiom. Unless there’s another way to translate that, I’m sure you should have no problem understanding me.

Read full topic

Wah, that doesn't even make sense. I'm not sure you understand the meaning of that idiom.

[quote=“duckroll, post:1, topic:328773”]- I want to receive any donations to the server, at least to cover costs. Then we split anything after the costs 50/50. Money goes to my paypal.

  • Server must be active and growing (50players online average is minimum), if you have a lot of players and your server is lagging at the moment this is your solution.
  • I want to be an admin (or co-owner) I’ll also have decisions on who becomes a moderator, who gets banned etc, if I think your friend is abusive I’ll just ban them.[/quote]Beggars can’t be choosers. item.title: I will host your server
item.dc:creator: @duckroll duckroll
item.description:
@duckroll wrote:

Lin:

First off, this isn’t allowed anywhere. Second, you have very high expectations. If you purchased a VPS, use it for the reason you bought it. Stop trying to make money from other people, cause this sure isn’t an act of kindness.

What’s the point in posting if your just gonna be a dick… Anyway, I’ve already used the VPS for the reason I purchased it for. I don’t need to go into what the reason was but I’ve finished with it now so thought I would put it to good use. Yah, and you don’t think I’m really gonna be making much money do you?? Probably won’t even cover costs, but if it does I said I would split it equally which is the decent thing to do. You say ‘making money off other people’ is wrong, even though 99% of peoples income in this world comes from other people. You buy a chocolate bar, your paying money to other people etc, nothing in this world is free… but sometimes you can get off of an initial investment.

Oh, and you say this is not an act of kindness, lols maybe not for you but there’s a lot of people here that can’t afford to pay out anything or don’t have the knowledge how to set this up, I’m fairly sure they would find it extremely kind of me to host the server 24/7 with no lag + also get a free domain and web hosting. Whatever though… oh, and sorry if this is against the rules - I didn’t see anything anywhere saying this was disallowed I just didn’t know what section it would fall under.

Read full topic
